title: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Intelligent Management Center UrlAccessController Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of Hewlett Packard Enterprise Intelligent Management Center.
The specific flaw exists within the UrlAccessController servlet. The issue results from the lack of proper filtering of URLs. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Hewlett Packard Enterprise has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.hpe.com/hpsc/doc/public/display?docId=a00093539en_us
timeline:
2019-08-09 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-01-29 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2021-03-02 - Advisory Updated
